channel.title: Daily Express :: World Feed
channel.description: Simply The Best 7 Days A Week

item.title: Tropical Storm Erick: Foreign Office warns against travel to this British holiday hotspot
item.description: The winds of change are gathering strength off Mexico's southern shores, as Tropical Storm Erick hints at a powerful metamorphosis.
item.author: Michael D. Carroll
item.media:keywords: Travel advice, Hurricane, Foreign Office, Tropical Storm Erick, UK Foreign Office, Mexico travel warning, Hurricane season.

item.title: Donald Trump 'considering strike' on Iran in latest WW3 bombshell
item.description: Special Middle East envoy Steve Witkoff and other military leaders have all taken part in a meeting at the White House.
item.author: Mieka Smiles,Conor Wilson
item.media:keywords: Breaking news, Iran, USa, Donald Trump, missile, military,

media:content.media:description: Trump is understood to be considering a military strike on Iran

media:thumbnail.media:description: Trump is understood to be considering a military strike on Iran

item.title: Incredible new train network could connect '100 European cities' - mapped
item.description: A European startup has set its sights on operating overnight trains across the continent with "fully personal rooms for one or two people at the price of a flight" by 2027.
item.author: Chris Samuel
item.media:keywords: Travel (section), Tourism, Trains, train line, 100 cities, map, mapped, Nox Mobility, European night trains, Thibault Constant, sleeper train innovation

media:content.media:description: Split of Nox Mobility map and image of what one of the room types could look like.

media:thumbnail.media:description: Split of Nox Mobility map and image of what one of the room types could look like.

item.title: Chaos in Spain as 200 holidaymakers banned from leaving through hotel front door
item.description: Police were called and a large sign reading 'Sealed Off' was put up at the front of the hotel.
item.author: Toby Codd,Natalia Penza
item.media:keywords: Spain, Hotels, Costa del Sol, Tourism, Vivemar Hotel, Benalmadena Costa, licensing issues, tourist restrictions

media:content.media:description: Police were called to the seaside hotel

media:thumbnail.media:description: Police were called to the seaside hotel

item.title: Shark attack horror as moment 'very brave' 9-year-old girl is rescued caught on camera
item.description: Body camera footage shows the horrifying moment police helped a young girl after a shark attack which nearly saw her lose her hand.
item.author: Emily Wright
item.media:keywords: Sharks, Florida, USA, Police, Hospital, Shark attack, Leah Lendel, Boca Grande, Florida shark bites, body camera footage, severed hand, blood everywhere, Tampa General Hospital, broken bones, transferred arteries, move all of her fingers

media:content.media:description: A young girl nearly lost her hand in a shark attack in Florida.

media:thumbnail.media:description: A young girl nearly lost her hand in a shark attack in Florida.

item.title: Crisis in Spain as British tourists abandon country for Africa
item.description: Growing numbers of Brits are turning away from Spain in favour of African destinations which are more affordable.
item.author: Emily Wright
item.media:keywords: Tourism, Morocco, British tourists, Spain, Africa, Cost of living, Spain tourism, Morocco travel, price increases, turning away from spain, more affordable, flight prices, pre-pandemic levels, budget-conscious, TUI UK, Booking.com, Tunisia, Egypt

item.title: Donald Trump threatens to assassinate Ayatollah Khamenei in WW3 madness: 'Easy target!'
item.description: The American president has issued an ominous warning about Iran's leader on social media saying "we are not going to take him out , at least not for now.
item.author: Mieka Smiles,Conor Wilson
item.media:keywords: Breaking news, Donald Trump, Military, World War 3, Iran, Trump, US military control, World War 3 fears

media:content.media:description: Trump has released a new statement on his social media platform

item.title: 40 war planes right on Russia border as UK, France and US send message to Putin
item.description: First-time host Finland brings fresh firepower to multinational drills, as allies focus on joint operations and deterrence amid growing tension with Moscow

item.title: Russia economy meltdown as Kremlin faces £78bn deficit after £24.3bn missed profit
item.description: Russian oil prices have increased by nearly 15% following the outbreak of hostilities between Israel and Iran.
item.author: Emily Wright
item.media:keywords: Russia, Oil, Economy, World Economy, Iran-Israel conflict, Iran, Israel, Russia economy, Urals crude oil, Israel-Iran conflict, Strait of Hormuz, national budget, hostilities, lowest level, revenues, decline, budget deficit, Gulf of Oman, South Pars

media:content.media:description: Russian oil prices have increased by nearly 15% since the outbreak of Israel-Iran hosilities.

item.title: Chinese military makes alarming 6G electronic weapon breakthrough
item.description: Technology is capable of jamming some of the world's most advanced radar systems, including that used by F-35 fighter jets
item.author: Carrington Walker
item.media:keywords: China, Military, USA, 6G technology, Chinese military, electronic warfare, Deng Lei, Donald Trump, war, technology, WW3, radar, UAV

media:content.media:description: China's military has developed a 6G electronic warfare weapon.
